eu_initiatives: Brexit and the future of the European Union in many policy areas.
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
relevant_communication:
Events and Workshops on Brexit and the impact that it has on varying policy areas, including financial services, agriculture, trade, medicines, international development and transport. 
Publications including EU reports and Brexit Anniversary Booklets.
goals__remit: Dublin City University (DCU) has established the Brexit Institute with the aim to explore how Brexit impacts on government, business and society at large. The Brexit Research & Policy Institute operates as a hub and a magnet for the analysis of Brexit, both from an academic and a policy perspective. Through the organization of regular events the Brexit Institute provides a leading platform to document and debate developments in the relations between the UK and the EU.
